scripts.build: tsc && powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path src -Filter *.proto -Recurse | ForEach-Object { $relativePath = $_.FullName.Substring((Get-Location).Path.Length + 5); $destPath = Join-Path 'dist' $relativePath; $destDir = Split-Path $destPath -Parent; if (-not (Test-Path $destDir)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $destDir -Force | Out-Null }; Copy-Item $_.FullName $destPath -Force }"
